header.title: Looks like your config file is missing some fields
header.subtitle: You need to create/update the config.json file in the root of the project. After you do it, refresh the page.
header.subtitle2: Check out the fields that you need to include in the config.json file:

domain.message: Please add the Facebook Graph API domain field to your config file.
domain.doc_info: You can find more information on how to fetch the API below

page_id.message: Please add the page_id field to your config file.
page_id.doc_info: You can find more information on how to get your Page ID in the documentation linked below.

page_access_token.message: Please add the page_access_token field to your config file.
page_access_token.doc_info: You can find more information on how to generate a page_access_token in the documentation linked below.

ig_user_id.message: Please add the ig_user_id field to your config file.
ig_user_id.doc_info: You can find more information on how to get the Instagram User ID of your account in the documentation linked below.

ig_access_token.message: Please add the ig_access_token field to your config file.
ig_access_token.doc_info: You can find more information on how to generate an Instagram Access Token in the documentation linked below.

user_access_token.message: Please add the user_access_token field to your config file.
user_access_token.doc_info: You can find more information on how to generate a user_access_token in the documentation linked below.

ad_account_id.message: Please add the ad_account_id field to your config file.
ad_account_id.doc_info: Please fetch your add accounts by making a call GET /me/adaccounts
